pageContext.claim: “When is Twitter going to allow the very popular Conservative Voices that it has so viciously shut down, back into the OPEN? IT IS TIME!”
pageContext.analysis: Twitter denies that Republicans are treated any differently than other users. There is no evidence -- but lots of conspiracy theories -- that Twitter is slanted against conservative voices. Twitter long has explained that follower figures fluctuate as the company takes action to remove fraudulent spam accounts.
